_INFO: QUEERZ! Player Character Template v2 - New Flexible Theme System
_INSTRUCTIONS: You can have any combination of 4 themes: Rainbow (Runway) or Anchor (Realness)

_THEME_TYPES.rainbow: Runway motivation themes with Growth/Shade trackers
_THEME_TYPES.anchor: Realness identity themes with Growth/Release trackers

themes._COMMENT: Theme 2 - Can be Rainbow or Anchor
Theme 3 - Can be Rainbow or Anchor

_GROWTH_MECHANICS.description: Fill 3 Growth boxes to unlock 1 greyed-out tag
_GROWTH_MECHANICS.progression: Start with 3 tags unlocked, unlock up to 6 total
_GROWTH_MECHANICS.rainbow_fade: Fill 3 Shade boxes → theme fades, must replace with Anchor theme
_GROWTH_MECHANICS.anchor_fade: Fill 3 Release boxes → theme fades, must replace with Rainbow theme
_GROWTH_MECHANICS.weakness_bonus: If you use Weakness AND roll 6-, automatically gain +1 Growth

_TAG_SYSTEM.power_tags: Click to add +1 power to roll (once per roll)
_TAG_SYSTEM.weakness_tag: Click to use (triggers Growth on 6- rolls)
_TAG_SYSTEM.burn_tags: Click flame icon to burn a tag (unusable until MC prompts recovery)
_TAG_SYSTEM.greyed_tags: Locked until Growth boxes are filled

_DICE_MECHANICS.core_move_required: Must select a core move before rolling
_DICE_MECHANICS.juice_spending: Spend up to 3 Juice to add to Power, OR spend 3 Juice to use a Combo
_DICE_MECHANICS.reset: Reset button clears unused Juice and all clicked tags

_FIREBASE_BROADCAST.to_mc: Player broadcasts: Name, Pronouns, Portrait, Status Tags, Story Tags
_FIREBASE_BROADCAST.from_mc: Player receives: Scene, Music, NPC Portrait, Status Tags, Story Tags
